SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.listener

Class ListenersHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listener.ListenersHandler
public class ListenersHandler extends Object
ListenersHandler class is responsible for managing a List of GameListener objects and for notifying the view when a change occurs in the GameModel

      The notify_onlyOnePlayerConnected method notifies that only one player is connected
      Parameters:

      secondsToWaitUntillGameEnded - is the number of seconds to wait untill the game ends
